Chapter 7: Purely functional parallelism
Exercise 7.8
Fork in its current implemention is prone to deadlock when fixed size Thread Pools are used. The fork submits a Callable and block waits for another Callable to be submitted and executed. They easily end up waiting for each other to finish. Deadlock
